content: the edge of the first scale and in between the posts of the next v st 12 10 8 scales made row 10- 11 repeat row 4 12 10 8 scales made row 12 repeat row 9 28 24 20 v sts made 14 12 10 scales made row 13-15 repeat row 4 14 12 10 scales made piece measures 11 5 tall row 16 foundation and scales - turn work as standard but do not join at the end instead work two double_crochet in the same space as the original two double_crochet then turn and work your scales back the way you came until the last two v sts skip the next v st as normal but instead of working a scale in the last v st just slip_stitch into the 2nd to last v st this leaves a slit between the first and last scales row 17 foundation and scales - turn chain 3 to start the next row double_crochet into the same space as the chain 3 you made work as standard doing 2dc in the center of the last scale and stopping there chain 1 and complete your first scale in the previous v st continue to the end doing a scale in the last v st chain 3 slip_stitch into the center of the scale you just made row 18 foundation and scales - chain 3 to start the next row double_crochet into the same space as the chain 3 you made work as standard doing your last 2dc in the v st to the left and behind the last scale of the previous row work your first scale in the v st you just made and continue back around as standard when you get to the end work your last scale in the 2nd to last v st then slip_stitch into the last v st row 19-24 repeat row 17 -18 row 25 repeat row 17 row 26 instead of starting your next row in the center of the last scale just chain 3 and start it at the right corner of the last scale you made double_crochet into the same space as the chain 3 you made continue making v sts as standard all the way around doing your last 2dc in the v st to the left and behind the last scale of the previous row work your first scale in the v st you just made and continue back around as standard when you get to the end work your last scale in the first v st you made that is the increase row 27 chain 3 slip_stitch into the center of the scale you just made chain 3 to start the next row double_crochet into the same space as the chain 3 you just made work as standard doing 2dc in the center of the last scale to make the increase do a last v st in the left corner of the last scale below turn work your first scale
